data.text: @sassybibrarian Yeah, but chances are the same people that would follow Trump’s suggestion of taking hydroxychloroquine or injection bleach!
@ccking51 It was just really insulting to my intelligence that she’d think I’d do something just because a politician said so.

@sassybibrarian A political figure isn't the "one" saying to get the vaccine.  Your friend forgot to include all the years of research and efforts made on this vaccine before Covid-19 raised its ugly head and attacked. You can't dismiss the WHO, NIH, etc. Do some research, John Hopkins has +data
